scripts.server: cd server && npm i && npm run dev
scripts.client: cd client && npm i && npm run dev
scripts.fastapi: cd fastApi && source .venv/Scripts/activate && fastapi dev main.py
scripts.fastapi-mac: cd fastapi && source .venv/bin/activate && fastapi dev main.py
scripts.devm: concurrently -k "npm run server" "npm run client" "npm run fastapi-ma"
